content.raw:
Just to add a bit of context to this:

When building sdformat within [drake](https://github.com/RobotLocomotion/drake/), the bazel build system is used (if it is not clear, this means that the sdformat build within drake does *not* use the CMake build system here, but essentially re-creates it in Bazel).  Bazel prefers to build all libraries statically, so it throws warnings in some situations when the `visibility` attributes are specified for static libraries (ala https://github.com/RobotLocomotion/drake/issues/8377, though the error is not at all obvious).  The simple solution in this patch is to have a define that can force the visibility to blank so that drake can build sdformat error-free.
